name: 4 x 4 Monster Truck Offroad Drifting
description:
4 x 4 Monster Truck Offroad Drifting

4x4 Monster Truck Offroad Drifting is a physics engine drift auto game.
Smooth controls, realistic auto physics.
Test your real drift skills.
Offroading games are fun and this one will make you will feel like you are simulating game.
You will enjoy this hill racing game by achieving the tasks assigned or taking on to the free mode where you can just roam around.
4x4 offroad vehicle, feel the power, discover new places, dynamic and amazing atmosphere, real time vehicle physics, outstanding environment.

Key features:

- Superp HD qulaity and amazing graphics
- Very easy controls
- Real time reflections and outstanding 4x4 offroad vehicle
- Dynamic physics
